# --- HUNK 1: Lines 428-484 ---
   428|             }
   429|         }
   430|     }
   431|     /**
   432|      * Run external transports
   433|      *
   434|      * @param  array  $obj  Alert-Array
   435|      * @return void
   436|      */
   437|     public function extTransports($obj)
   438|     {
   439|         $type = new Template;
   440|         $transport_maps = AlertUtil::getAlertTransports($obj['alert_id']);
   441|         if (! $transport_maps) {
   442|             $transport_maps = AlertUtil::getDefaultAlertTransports();
   443|         }
   444|         if (Config::get('alert.transports.mail') === true && ! empty($obj['contacts'])) {
   445|             $transport_maps[] = [
   446|                 'transport_id' => null,
   447|                 'transport_type' => 'mail',
   448|                 'opts' => $obj,
   449|             ];
   450|         }
   451|         foreach ($transport_maps as $item) {
   452|             $class = Transport::getClass($item['transport_type']);
   453|             if (class_exists($class)) {
   454|                 $transport_title = "Transport {$item['transport_type']}";
   455|                 $obj['transport'] = $item['transport_type'];
   456|                 $obj['transport_name'] = $item['transport_name'];
   457|                 $obj['alert'] = new AlertData($obj);
   458|                 $obj['title'] = $type->getTitle($obj);
   459|                 $obj['alert']['title'] = $obj['title'];
   460|                 $obj['msg'] = $type->getBody($obj);
   461|                 c_echo(" :: $transport_title => ");
   462|                 try {
   463|                     $instance = new $class(AlertTransport::find($item['transport_id']));
   464|                     $tmp = $instance->deliverAlert($obj, $item['opts'] ?? []);
   465|                     $this->alertLog($tmp, $obj, $obj['transport']);
   466|                 } catch (AlertTransportDeliveryException $e) {
   467|                     Eventlog::log($e->getTraceAsString() . PHP_EOL . $e->getMessage(), $obj['device_id'], 'alert', Severity::Error);
   468|                     $this->alertLog($e->getMessage(), $obj, $obj['transport']);
   469|                 } catch (\Exception $e) {
   470|                     $this->alertLog($e, $obj, $obj['transport']);
   471|                 }
   472|                 unset($instance);
   473|                 echo PHP_EOL;
   474|             }
   475|         }
   476|         if (count($transport_maps) === 0) {
   477|             echo 'No configured transports';
   478|         }
   479|     }
   480|     public function alertLog($result, $obj, $transport)
   481|     {
   482|         $prefix = [
   483|             AlertState::RECOVERED => 'recovery',
   484|             AlertState::ACTIVE => $obj['severity'] . ' alert',

    16|  * Mail Transport
    17|  *
    18|  * @author f0o <f0o@devilcode.org>
    19|  * @copyright 2014 f0o, LibreNMS
    20|  * @license GPL
    21|  */
    22| namespace LibreNMS\Alert\Transport;
    23| use Exception;
    24| use LibreNMS\Alert\AlertUtil;
    25| use LibreNMS\Alert\Transport;
    26| use LibreNMS\Config;
    27| use LibreNMS\Exceptions\AlertTransportDeliveryException;
    28| class Mail extends Transport
    29| {
    30|     public function deliverAlert(array $alert_data): bool
    31|     {
    32|         $emails = match ($this->config['mail-contact'] ?? '') {
    33|             'sysContact' => AlertUtil::findContactsSysContact($alert_data['faults']),
    34|             'owners' => AlertUtil::findContactsOwners($alert_data['faults']),
    35|             'role' => AlertUtil::findContactsRoles([$this->config['role']]),
    36|             default => $this->config['email'],
    37|         };
    38|         $html = Config::get('email_html');
    39|         if ($html && ! $this->isHtmlContent($alert_data['msg'])) {
    40|             $msg = preg_replace("/\r?\n/", "<br />\n", $alert_data['msg']);
    41|         } else {
    42|             $msg = preg_replace("/(?<!\r)\n/", "\r\n", $alert_data['msg']);
    43|         }
    44|         try {
    45|             return \LibreNMS\Util\Mail::send($emails, $alert_data['title'], $msg, $html, $this->config['bcc'] ?? false, $this->config['attach-graph'] ?? null);
    46|         } catch (Exception $e) {
    47|             throw new AlertTransportDeliveryException($alert_data, 0, $e->getMessage());
    48|         }
    49|     }
    50|     public static function configTemplate(): array
    51|     {
    52|         $roles = array_merge(['None' => ''], \Bouncer::role()->pluck('name', 'title')->all());
    53|         return [
    54|             'config' => [
    55|                 [
    56|                     'title' => 'Contact Type',

    23| namespace LibreNMS\OS;
    24| use App\Models\EntPhysical;
    25| use Illuminate\Support\Collection;
    26| use LibreNMS\OS\Shared\Radlan;
    27| use LibreNMS\OS\Traits\EntityMib;
    28| use LibreNMS\Util\StringHelpers;
    29| use SnmpQuery;
    30| class EltexMes23xx extends Radlan
    31| {
    32|     use EntityMib {
    33|         EntityMib::discoverEntityPhysical as discoverBaseEntityPhysical;
    34|     }
    35|     public function discoverEntityPhysical(): Collection
    36|     {
    37|         $inventory = $this->discoverBaseEntityPhysical();
    38|         $trans = SnmpQuery::hideMib()->enumStrings()->walk('ELTEX-MES-PHYSICAL-DESCRIPTION-MIB::eltPhdTransceiverInfoTable')->table(1);
    39|         $ifIndexToEntIndexMap = array_flip($this->getIfIndexEntPhysicalMap());
    40|         foreach ($trans as $ifIndex => $data) {
    41|             $inventory->push(new EntPhysical([
    42|                 'entPhysicalIndex' => 1000000 + $ifIndex,
    43|                 'entPhysicalDescr' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoType'],
    44|                 'entPhysicalClass' => 'sfp-cage',
    45|                 'entPhysicalName' => strtoupper($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoConnectorType']),
    46|                 'entPhysicalModelName' => $this->normData($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoPartNumber']),
    47|                 'entPhysicalSerialNum' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoSerialNumber'],
    48|                 'entPhysicalContainedIn' => $ifIndexToEntIndexMap[$ifIndex] ?? 0,
    49|                 'entPhysicalMfgName' => $data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoVendorName'],
    50|                 'entPhysicalHardwareRev' => $this->normData($data['eltPhdTransceiverInfoVendorRev']),
    51|                 'entPhysicalParentRelPos' => 0,
    52|                 'entPhysicalIsFRU' => 'true',
    53|                 'ifIndex' => $ifIndex,
    54|             ]));
    55|         }
    56|         return $inventory;
    57|     }
    58|     /**
    59|      * Specific HexToString for Eltex
    60|      */
    61|     protected function normData(string $par = ''): string
    62|     {
    63|         return StringHelpers::isHex($par) ? StringHelpers::hexToAscii($par, ' ') : $par;
    64|     }
    65| }

    26| use App\Models\PortsNac;
    27| use Illuminate\Support\Collection;
    28| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Data\DataStorageInterface;
    29| use LibreNMS\Interfaces\Polling\NacPolling;

    32| use SnmpQuery;
    33| class Procurve extends \LibreNMS\OS implements OSPolling, NacPolling
    34| {
    35|     public function pollOS(DataStorageInterface $datastore): void
    36|     {
    37|         $FdbAddressCount = snmp_get($this->getDeviceArray(), 'hpSwitchFdbAddressCount.0', '-Ovqn', 'STATISTICS-MIB');
    38|         if (is_numeric($FdbAddressCount)) {
    39|             $rrd_def = RrdDefinition::make()->addDataset('value', 'GAUGE', -1, 100000);
    40|             $fields = [
    41|                 'value' => $FdbAddressCount,
    42|             ];
    43|             $tags = compact('rrd_def');
    44|             $datastore->put($this->getDeviceArray(), 'fdb_count', $tags, $fields);
    45|             $this->enableGraph('fdb_count');
    46|         }
    47|     }
    48|     public function pollNac()
    49|     {
    50|         $nac = new Collection();
    51|         $enabled = SnmpQuery::mibs(['IEEE8021-PAE-MIB'])->hideMib()->enumStrings()->get('dot1xPaeSystemAuthControl.0')->value();
    52|         if ($enabled !== 'enabled') {
    53|             return $nac;

# --- HUNK 2: Lines 92-112 ---
    92|                 continue;
    93|             }
    94|             $nacEntry = array_pop($entry);
    95|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['vlan'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionVid'];
    96|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['authz_by'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionAuthenticMethod'];
    97|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['username'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionUserName'];
    98|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['time_elapsed'] = $nacEntry['hpicfDot1xAuthSessionTime'] / 100;
    99|         }
   100|         $table = SnmpQuery::mibs(['HP-DOT1X-EXTENSIONS-MIB'])->hideMib()->enumStrings()->walk('hpicfDot1xPaePortTable')->table(2);
   101|         foreach ($table as $ifIndex => $nacEntry) {
   102|             if (! isset($rowSet[$ifIndex])) {
   103|                 continue;
   104|             }
   105|             $rowSet[$ifIndex]['method'] = ($nacEntry['hpicfDot1xPaePortAuth'] === 'true') ? 'dot1x' : '';
   106|         }
   107|         foreach ($rowSet as $row) {
   108|             $nac->put($row['mac_address'], new PortsNac($row));
   109|         }
   110|         return $nac;
   111|     }

    69|     public function discoverEntityPhysical(): Collection
    70|     {
    71|         $inventory = $this->discoverBaseEntityPhysical();
    72|         $extra = \SnmpQuery::walk([
    73|             'HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBoardType',
    74|             'HUAWEI-ENTITY-EXTENT-MIB::hwEntityBomEnDesc',
    75|         ])->table(1);
    76|         $inventory->each(function (EntPhysical $entry) use ($extra) {

    84|             }
    85|         });

    88|     public function discoverMempools()

    25| namespace LibreNMS\OS;
    26| use App\Models\Device;
    27| use LibreNMS\OS\Traits\ServerHardware;
    28| class Windows extends \LibreNMS\OS
    29| {
    30|     use ServerHardware;
    31|     public function discoverOS(Device $device): void
    32|     {
    33|         if (preg_match('/Hardware: (?<hardware>.*) +- Software: .* Version (?<nt>\S+) +\(Build( Number:)? (?<build>\S+) (?<smp>\S+)/', $device->sysDescr, $matches)) {
    34|             $device->hardware = $this->parseHardware($matches['hardware'] ?? null);
    35|             $device->features = $matches['smp'] ?? null;
    36|             $build = $matches['build'] ?? null;
    37|             if ($device->sysObjectID == '.1.3.6.1.4.1.311.1.1.3.1.1') {
    38|                 $device->version = $this->getClientVersion($build, $matches['version'] ?? null);
    39|             } elseif ($device->sysObjectID == '.1.3.6.1.4.1.311.1.1.3.1.2') {
    40|                 $device->version = $this->getServerVersion($build);
    41|             } elseif ($device->sysObjectID == '.1.3.6.1.4.1.311.1.1.3.1.3') {
    42|                 $device->version = $this->getDatacenterVersion($build);
    43|             }
    44|         }
    45|         $this->discoverServerHardware();
    46|     }
    47|     private function parseHardware($processor)
    48|     {
    49|         preg_match('/(?<generic>\S+) Family (?<family>\d+) Model (?<model>\d+) Stepping (?<stepping>\d+)/', $processor, $matches);
    50|         $generic = [
    51|             'AMD64' => 'AMD x64',
    52|             'Intel64' => 'Intel x64',
    53|             'EM64T' => 'Intel x64',
    54|             'x86' => 'Generic x86',
    55|             'ia64' => 'Intel Itanium IA64',
    56|         ];
    57|         return $generic[$matches['generic']] ?? null;
    58|     }
    59|     private function getClientVersion($build, $version)
    60|     {
    61|         $default = $build > 10000 ? '10 (NT 6.3)' : null;
    62|         $default = $build > 22000 ? '11 Insider (NT 6.3)' : null;
    63|         $builds = [
    64|             '26100' => '11 (24H2)',
    65|             '22631' => '11 (23H2)',
    66|             '22621' => '11 (22H2)',
    67|             '22000' => '11 (21H2)',
    68|             '19045' => '10 (22H2)',
    69|             '19044' => '10 (21H2)',
    70|             '19043' => '10 (21H1)',
    71|             '19042' => '10 (20H2)',
    72|             '19041' => '10 (2004)',
    73|             '18363' => '10 (1909)',
    74|             '18362' => '10 (1903)',
    75|             '17763' => '10 (1809)',
    76|             '17134' => '10 (1803)',

    42|             $emails = preg_split('/[,;]\s{0,}/', $emails);

    44|                 if (preg_match($regex, $email, $out, PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE)) {
    45|                     $result[$out[2][0]] = $out[1][0];
    46|                 } else {
    47|                     if (strpos($email, '@')) {
    48|                         $from_name = Config::get('email_user');
    49|                         $result[$email] = $from_name;
    50|                     }
    51|                 }
    52|             }
    53|             return $result;
    54|         }
    55|         return false;
    56|     }

   110|      * @param  Port  $port

   112|      * @param  string  $type
   113|      * @param  bool  $overlib
   114|      * @param  bool  $single_graph
   115|      * @return mixed|string
   116|      */
   117|     public static function portLink($port, $text = null, $type = null, $overlib = true, $single_graph = false)
   118|     {
   119|         if ($port === null) {
   120|             return $text;
   121|         }
   122|         $label = Rewrite::normalizeIfName($port->getLabel());
   123|         if (! $text) {
   124|             $text = $label;
   125|         }
   126|         $content = '<div class=list-large>' . addslashes(htmlentities($port->device?->displayName() . ' - ' . $label)) . '</div>';
   127|         if ($description = $port->getDescription()) {
   128|             $content .= addslashes(htmlentities($description)) . '<br />';
   129|         }
   130|         $content .= "<div style=\'width: 850px\'>";
   131|         $graph_array = [
   132|             'type' => $type ?: 'port_bits',
   133|             'legend' => 'yes',
   134|             'height' => 100,
   135|             'width' => 340,
   136|             'to' => Carbon::now()->timestamp,
   137|             'from' => Carbon::now()->subDay()->timestamp,
   138|             'id' => $port->port_id,
   139|         ];
   140|         $content .= self::graphTag($graph_array);
   141|         if (! $single_graph) {
   142|             $graph_array['from'] = Carbon::now()->subWeek()->timestamp;
   143|             $content .= self::graphTag($graph_array);
   144|             $graph_array['from'] = Carbon::now()->subMonth()->timestamp;
   145|             $content .= self::graphTag($graph_array);
   146|             $graph_array['from'] = Carbon::now()->subYear()->timestamp;
   147|             $content .= self::graphTag($graph_array);
   148|         }

    25| namespace LibreNMS\Util;
    26| class Validate
    27| {
    28|     /**
    29|      * Checks if the give string is a valid hostname
    30|      *
    31|      * @param  string  $hostname
    32|      * @return bool
    33|      */
    34|     public static function hostname($hostname)
    35|     {
    36|         return
    37|             preg_match("/^([a-z\d](-*[a-z\d])*)(\.([a-z\d](-*[a-z\d])*))*\.?$/i", $hostname) //valid chars check
    38|             && preg_match('/^.{1,253}$/', $hostname) //overall length check
    39|             && preg_match("/^[^\.]{1,63}(\.[^\.]{1,63})*\.?$/", $hostname);
    40|     }
    41|     public static function ascDesc($direction, $default = 'ASC')
    42|     {
    43|         return in_array(strtolower($direction), ['asc', 'desc'], true)
    44|             ? $direction
    45|             : $default;
    46|     }
    47| }

   294|     def start_dispatch(self):

   296|         Start the dispatch timer, this is not called automatically on init
   297|         """

   302|         Stop the dispatch timer

   306|     def dispatch_calculate_billing(self):
   307|         self.post_work("calculate", 0)
   308|     def do_dispatch(self):
   309|         self.post_work("poll", 0)
   310|     def do_work(self, run_type, group):
   311|         if run_type == "poll":
   312|             logger.info("Polling billing")
   313|             args = ("-d") if self.config.debug else ()
   314|             exit_code, output = LibreNMS.call_script("poll-billing.php", args)
   315|         else:  # run_type == 'calculate'
   316|             logger.info("Calculating billing")
   317|             args = ("-d") if self.config.debug else ()
   318|             exit_code, output = LibreNMS.call_script("billing-calculate.php", args)
   319|         if exit_code != 0:
   320|             logger.warning(
   321|                 "Error {} in {} billing:\n{}".format(exit_code, run_type, output)
   322|             )
   323|         if self.config.log_output:
   324|             with open(
   325|                 "{}/dispatch_billing-{}.log".format(self.config.logdir, run_type), "a"
   326|             ) as log_file:
   327|                 log_file.write(output)

    55|             'url' => Url::deviceLink($device, null, [], 0, 0, 0, 1),
    56|             'hw' => $device->hardware,
    57|             'name' => $device->shortDisplayName(),
    58|         ];
    59|         if ($selection == 'list') {
    60|             $linksQuery = $device->links()->with('port', 'remoteDevice', 'remotePort');
    61|             foreach ($linksQuery->get()->sortBy('port.ifName') as $link) {
    62|                 $links[] = [
    63|                     'local_url' => Url::portLink($link->port, null, null, true, false),
    64|                     'ldev_id' => $device->device_id,
    65|                     'local_portname' => $link->port->ifAlias,
    66|                     'rport_url' => $link->remotePort ? Url::portLink($link->remotePort, null, null, true, false) : '',
    67|                     'rdev_url' => $link->remoteDevice ? Url::deviceLink($link->remoteDevice, null, [], 0, 0, 0, 1) : null,
    68|                     'rdev_name' => $link->remoteDevice ? $link->remoteDevice->shortDisplayName() : $link->remote_hostname,
    69|                     'rdev_info' => $link->remoteDevice ? $link->remoteDevice->hardware : $link->remote_platform,
    70|                     'rport_name' => $link->remotePort ? $link->remotePort->ifAlias : $link->remote_port,
    71|                     'protocol' => strtoupper($link->protocol),
    72|                 ];
    73|             }
    74|         }
    75|         return [
    76|             'selections' => [
    77|                 'list' => [
    78|                     'text' => 'List',
    79|                     'link' => Url::deviceUrl($device, ['tab' => 'neighbours', 'selection' => 'list']),
    80|                 ],
    81|                 'map' => [
    82|                     'text' => 'Map',
    83|                     'link' => Url::deviceUrl($device, ['tab' => 'neighbours', 'selection' => 'map']),
    84|                 ],
    85|             ],
    86|             'selection' => $selection,
    87|             'device_id' => $device->device_id,
    88|             'links' => $links,
    89|             'link_types' => Config::get('network_map_items', ['xdp', 'mac']),
    90|             'visoptions' => Config::get('network_map_vis_options'),
    91|         ];
    92|     }
    93| }

   207|     public function update(CustomMapSettingsRequest $request, CustomMap $map): JsonResponse

   223|     /**
   224|      * Get a list of all available node images with a label.
   225|      */
   226|     private function listNodeImages(): array
   227|     {
   228|         $images = [];
   229|         $image_translations = __('map.custom.edit.node.image_options');
   230|         foreach (Storage::disk('base')->files('html/images/custommap/icons') as $image) {
   231|             if (in_array(strtolower(pathinfo($image, PATHINFO_EXTENSION)), ['svg', 'png', 'jpg', 'gif'])) {
   232|                 $file = pathinfo($image, PATHINFO_BASENAME);
   233|                 $filename = pathinfo($image, PATHINFO_FILENAME);
   234|                 $images[$file] = $image_translations[$filename] ?? ucwords(str_replace(['-', '_'], [' - ', ' '], $filename));
   235|             }
   236|         }
   237|         return $images;
   238|     }

   250|             'font_size' => $map->legend_font_size,
   251|             'colours' => $map->legend_colours,
   252|         ];
   253|         return $legend;
   254|     }

    39|     public function get(Request $request, CustomMap $map): JsonResponse
    40|     {
    41|         $this->authorize('view', $map);
    42|         $map->load(['nodes.device', 'nodes.device.location', 'nodes.linked_map']);
    43|         $edges = [];
    44|         $nodes = [];
    45|         if ($map->legend_colours) {
    46|             $sorted_colours = $map->legend_colours;
    47|             ksort($sorted_colours, SORT_NUMERIC);
    48|         }
    49|         foreach ($map->edges as $edge) {
    50|             $edgeid = $edge->custom_map_edge_id;
    51|             $edges[$edgeid] = [
    52|                 'custom_map_edge_id' => $edge->custom_map_edge_id,
    53|                 'custom_map_node1_id' => $edge->custom_map_node1_id,
    54|                 'custom_map_node2_id' => $edge->custom_map_node2_id,
    55|                 'port_id' => $edge->port_id,
    56|                 'reverse' => $edge->reverse,
    57|                 'style' => $edge->style,
    58|                 'showpct' => $edge->showpct,
    59|                 'showbps' => $edge->showbps,
    60|                 'label' => $edge->label,
    61|                 'fixed_width' => $edge->fixed_width,
    62|                 'text_face' => $edge->text_face,
    63|                 'text_size' => $edge->text_size,
    64|                 'text_colour' => $edge->text_colour,
    65|                 'mid_x' => $edge->mid_x,
    66|                 'mid_y' => $edge->mid_y,
    67|             ];

    69|                 $edges[$edgeid]['device_id'] = $edge->port->device_id;
    70|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_name'] = $edge->port->device->displayName() . ' - ' . $edge->port->getLabel();
    71|                 $edges[$edgeid]['port_info'] = Url::portLink($edge->port, null, null, false, true);
    72|                 $speedto = 0;
    73|                 $speedfrom = 0;

    75|                 $ratefrom = 0;
    76|                 if ($edge->port->port_descr_speed) {
    77|                     $speed_parts = explode('/', $edge->port->port_descr_speed, 2);
    78|                     if (count($speed_parts) == 1) {
    79|                         $speedto = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[0]);
    80|                         $speedfrom = $speedto;
    81|                     } elseif ($edge->reverse) {
    82|                         $speedto = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[1]);
    83|                         $speedfrom = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[0]);
    84|                     } else {
    85|                         $speedto = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[0]);
    86|                         $speedfrom = $this->snmpSpeed($speed_parts[1]);
    87|                     }
    88|                     if ($speedto == 0 || $speedfrom == 0) {
    89|                         $speedto = 0;
    90|                         $speedfrom = 0;
    91|                     }

   184|     public function save(Request $request, CustomMap $map): JsonResponse
   185|     {
   186|         $this->authorize('update', $map);
   187|         $data = $this->validate($request, [
   188|             'newnodeconf' => 'array',
   189|             'newedgeconf' => 'array',
   190|             'nodes' => 'array',
   191|             'edges' => 'array',
   192|             'legend_x' => 'integer',
   193|             'legend_y' => 'integer',
   194|             'legend_steps' => 'integer',

# --- HUNK 3: Lines 215-290 ---
   215|             $map->newnodeconfig = $data['newnodeconf'];
   216|             $map->newedgeconfig = $data['newedgeconf'];
   217|             $map->save();
   218|             foreach ($data['nodes'] as $nodeid => $node) {
   219|                 if (strpos($nodeid, 'new') === 0) {
   220|                     $dbnode = new CustomMapNode;
   221|                     $dbnode->map()->associate($map);
   222|                 } else {
   223|                     $dbnode = $dbnodes[$nodeid];
   224|                     if (! $dbnode) {
   225|                         Log::error('Could not find existing node for node id ' . $nodeid);
   226|                         abort(404);
   227|                     }
   228|                 }
   229|                 $dbnode->device_id = is_numeric($node['title']) ? $node['title'] : null;
   230|                 $dbnode->linked_custom_map_id = str_starts_with($node['title'], 'map:') ? (int) str_replace('map:', '', $node['title']) : null;
   231|                 $dbnode->label = $node['label'];
   232|                 $dbnode->style = $node['shape'];
   233|                 $dbnode->icon = $node['icon'];
   234|                 $dbnode->image = $node['image']['unselected'] ?? '';
   235|                 $dbnode->size = $node['size'];
   236|                 $dbnode->text_face = $node['font']['face'];
   237|                 $dbnode->text_size = $node['font']['size'];
   238|                 $dbnode->text_colour = $node['font']['color'];
   239|                 $dbnode->colour_bg = $node['color']['background'] ?? null;
   240|                 $dbnode->colour_bdr = $node['color']['border'] ?? null;
   241|                 $dbnode->border_width = $node['borderWidth'];
   242|                 $dbnode->x_pos = intval($node['x']);
   243|                 $dbnode->y_pos = intval($node['y']);
   244|                 $dbnode->save();
   245|                 $nodesProcessed[$dbnode->custom_map_node_id] = true;
   246|                 $newNodes[$nodeid] = $dbnode;
   247|             }
   248|             foreach ($data['edges'] as $edgeid => $edge) {
   249|                 if (strpos($edgeid, 'new') === 0) {
   250|                     $dbedge = new CustomMapEdge;
   251|                     $dbedge->map()->associate($map);
   252|                 } else {
   253|                     $dbedge = $dbedges[$edgeid];
   254|                     if (! $dbedge) {
   255|                         Log::error('Could not find existing edge for edge id ' . $edgeid);
   256|                         abort(404);
   257|                     }
   258|                 }
   259|                 $dbedge->custom_map_node1_id = strpos($edge['from'], 'new') == 0 ? $newNodes[$edge['from']]->custom_map_node_id : $edge['from'];
   260|                 $dbedge->custom_map_node2_id = strpos($edge['to'], 'new') == 0 ? $newNodes[$edge['to']]->custom_map_node_id : $edge['to'];
   261|                 $dbedge->port_id = $edge['port_id'] ? $edge['port_id'] : null;
   262|                 $dbedge->reverse = filter_var($edge['reverse'], FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE);
   263|                 $dbedge->showpct = filter_var($edge['showpct'], FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE);
   264|                 $dbedge->showbps = filter_var($edge['showbps'], FILTER_VALIDATE_BOOLEAN, FILTER_NULL_ON_FAILURE);
   265|                 $dbedge->label = $edge['label'] ? $edge['label'] : '';
   266|                 $dbedge->fixed_width = $edge['fixed_width'];
   267|                 $dbedge->style = $edge['style'];
   268|                 $dbedge->text_face = $edge['text_face'];
   269|                 $dbedge->text_size = $edge['text_size'];
   270|                 $dbedge->text_colour = $edge['text_colour'];
   271|                 $dbedge->mid_x = intval($edge['mid_x']);
   272|                 $dbedge->mid_y = intval($edge['mid_y']);
   273|                 $dbedge->save();
   274|                 $edgesProcessed[$dbedge->custom_map_edge_id] = true;
   275|             }
   276|             foreach ($map->edges as $edge) {
   277|                 if (! array_key_exists($edge->custom_map_edge_id, $edgesProcessed)) {
   278|                     $edge->delete();
   279|                 }
   280|             }
   281|             foreach ($map->nodes as $node) {
   282|                 if (! array_key_exists($node->custom_map_node_id, $nodesProcessed)) {
   283|                     $node->delete();
   284|                 }
   285|             }
   286|         });
   287|         return response()->json(['id' => $map->custom_map_id]);
   288|     }
   289|     private function rateString(int $rate): string
   290|     {

    33|     public function dependencyMap(Request $request): View
    34|     {

    43|             'options' => Config::get('network_map_vis_options'),
    44|             'group_name' => $group_name,
    45|         ];

    27| use App\Models\DeviceGroup;
    28| use Illuminate\Http\Request;
    29| use Illuminate\View\View;
    30| use LibreNMS\Config;
    31| use LibreNMS\Util\Url;
    32| class NetMapController extends Controller
    33| {
    34|     public function netMap(Request $request, $vars = ''): View
    35|     {
    36|         $group_id = Url::parseOptions('group');
    37|         $group_name = DeviceGroup::where('id', '=', $group_id)->first('name');
    38|         if (! empty($group_name)) {
    39|             $group_name = $group_name->name;
    40|         }
    41|         $data = [
    42|             'page_refresh' => Config::get('page_refresh', 300),
    43|             'group_id' => $group_id,
    44|             'options' => Config::get('network_map_vis_options'),
    45|             'group_name' => $group_name,
    46|             'link_types' => Config::get('network_map_items', ['xdp', 'mac']),
    47|         ];
    48|         return view('map.netmap', $data);
    49|     }

# FILE: app/Http/Controllers/Table/PortsController.php
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 94-170 ---
    94|             'ifMtu',
    95|             'ifSpeed',
    96|         ];
    97|     }
    98|     protected function baseQuery($request)
    99|     {
   100|         $query = Port::hasAccess($request->user())
   101|             ->with(['device', 'device.location'])
   102|             ->leftJoin('devices', 'ports.device_id', 'devices.device_id')
   103|             ->where('deleted', $request->get('deleted', 0)) // always filter deleted
   104|             ->when($request->get('hostname'), function (Builder $query, $hostname) {
   105|                 $query->where(function (Builder $query) use ($hostname) {
   106|                     $query->where('devices.hostname', 'like', "%$hostname%")
   107|                         ->orWhere('devices.sysName', 'like', "%$hostname%");
   108|                 });
   109|             })
   110|             ->when($request->get('ifAlias'), function (Builder $query, $ifAlias) {
   111|                 return $query->where('ifAlias', 'like', "%$ifAlias%");
   112|             })
   113|             ->when($request->get('errors'), function (Builder $query) {
   114|                 $query->where(function (Builder $query) {
   115|                     return $query->where('ifInErrors_delta', '>', 0)
   116|                         ->orWhere('ifOutErrors_delta', '>', 0);
   117|                 });
   118|             })
   119|             ->when($request->get('state'), function (Builder $query, $state) {
   120|                 switch ($state) {
   121|                     case 'down':
   122|                         return $query->where('ifAdminStatus', 'up')->where('ifOperStatus', 'down');
   123|                     case 'up':
   124|                         return $query->where('ifAdminStatus', 'up')->where('ifOperStatus', 'up');
   125|                     case 'admindown':
   126|                         return $query->where('ifAdminStatus', 'down')->where('ports.ignore', 0);
   127|                     default:
   128|                         return $query;
   129|                 }
   130|             });
   131|         $select = [
   132|             'ports.*',
   133|             'hostname',
   134|         ];
   135|         if (array_key_exists('secondsIfLastChange', Arr::wrap($request->get('sort')))) {
   136|             $select[] = DB::raw('`devices`.`uptime` - `ports`.`ifLastChange` / 100 as secondsIfLastChange');
   137|         }
   138|         return $query->select($select);
   139|     }
   140|     /**
   141|      * @param  \App\Models\Port  $port
   142|      * @return array
   143|      */
   144|     public function formatItem($port)
   145|     {
   146|         $status = $port->ifOperStatus == 'down'
   147|             ? ($port->ifAdminStatus == 'up' ? 'label-danger' : 'label-warning')
   148|             : 'label-success';
   149|         return [
   150|             'status' => $status,
   151|             'device' => Url::deviceLink($port->device),
   152|             'port' => Url::portLink($port),
   153|             'secondsIfLastChange' => ceil($port->device?->uptime - ($port->ifLastChange / 100)),
   154|             'ifConnectorPresent' => ($port->ifConnectorPresent == 'true') ? 'yes' : 'no',
   155|             'ifSpeed' => $port->ifSpeed,
   156|             'ifMtu' => $port->ifMtu,
   157|             'ifInOctets_rate' => $port->ifInOctets_rate * 8,
   158|             'ifOutOctets_rate' => $port->ifOutOctets_rate * 8,
   159|             'ifInUcastPkts_rate' => $port->ifInUcastPkts_rate,
   160|             'ifOutUcastPkts_rate' => $port->ifOutUcastPkts_rate,
   161|             'ifInErrors' => $port->ifInErrors,
   162|             'ifOutErrors' => $port->ifOutErrors,
   163|             'ifInErrors_delta' => $port->poll_period ? Number::formatSi($port->ifInErrors_delta / $port->poll_period, 2, 3, 'EPS') : '',
   164|             'ifOutErrors_delta' => $port->poll_period ? Number::formatSi($port->ifOutErrors_delta / $port->poll_period, 2, 3, 'EPS') : '',
   165|             'ifType' => Rewrite::normalizeIfType($port->ifType),
   166|             'ifAlias' => $port->ifAlias,
   167|             'actions' => (string) view('port.actions', ['port' => $port]),
   168|         ];
   169|     }
   170| }

    26| use App\Models\CustomMap;
    27| use Illuminate\Http\Request;
    28| use LibreNMS\Config;
    29| class CustomMapController extends WidgetController
    30| {
    31|     protected $title = 'Custom Map';
    32|     protected $defaults = [
    33|         'title' => null,
    34|         'custom_map' => null,
    35|     ];
    36|     public function __construct()
    37|     {
    38|         $this->authorizeResource(CustomMap::class, 'map');
    39|     }
    40|     public function getView(Request $request)
    41|     {
    42|         $data = $this->getSettings(true);
    43|         $data['map'] = CustomMap::find($data['custom_map']);
    44|         if (! $data['map']) {
    45|             return __('map.custom.widget.not_found');
    46|         }
    47|         $data['base_url'] = Config::get('base_url');
    48|         $data['background_config'] = $data['map']->getBackgroundConfig();
    49|         $data['map_conf'] = $data['map']->options;
    50|         $scalex = (float) $request->dimensions['x'] / (float) $data['map']->width;
    51|         $scaley = (float) $request->dimensions['y'] / (float) $data['map']->height;
    52|         $data['scale'] = min($scalex, $scaley);
    53|         return view('widgets.custom-map', $data);
    54|     }

    39|     public function scopeHasAccess($query, User $user)
    40|     {
    41|         if ($user->hasGlobalRead()) {
    42|             return $query;
    43|         }
    44|         return $this->hasDeviceAccess($query, $user);
    45|     }

    47|     {
    48|         return $this->belongsTo(CustomMap::class, 'custom_map_id');
    49|     }

    53|     }

    55|     {
    56|         return $this->belongsTo(CustomMap::class, 'linked_custom_map_id');
    57|     }
    58|     public function edges1(): HasMany
    59|     {

    61|     }
    62|     public function edges2(): HasMany
    63|     {

    65|     }

   120|     public function getIfPhysAddressAttribute($mac)
   121|     {
   122|         if (! empty($mac)) {
   123|             return preg_replace('/(..)(..)(..)(..)(..)(..)/', '\\1:\\2:\\3:\\4:\\5:\\6', $mac);
   124|         }
   125|         return null;
   126|     }
   127|     /**
   128|      * @param  Builder  $query
   129|      * @return Builder
   130|      */
   131|     public function scopeIsDeleted($query)
   132|     {
   133|         return $query->where([
   134|             ['deleted', 1],
   135|         ]);
   136|     }
   137|     /**
   138|      * @param  Builder  $query
   139|      * @return Builder
   140|      */
   141|     public function scopeIsNotDeleted($query)
   142|     {
   143|         return $query->where([
   144|             ['deleted', 0],
   145|         ]);
   146|     }
   147|     /**
   148|      * @param  Builder  $query
   149|      * @return Builder

   151|     public function scopeIsUp($query)
   152|     {
   153|         return $query->where([
   154|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   155|             ['ignore', '=', 0],
   156|             ['disabled', '=', 0],
   157|             ['ifOperStatus', '=', 'up'],
   158|         ]);
   159|     }
   160|     /**
   161|      * @param  Builder  $query
   162|      * @return Builder
   163|      */
   164|     public function scopeIsDown($query)
   165|     {
   166|         return $query->where([
   167|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   168|             ['ignore', '=', 0],
   169|             ['disabled', '=', 0],
   170|             ['ifOperStatus', '!=', 'up'],
   171|             ['ifAdminStatus', '=', 'up'],
   172|         ]);
   173|     }
   174|     /**
   175|      * @param  Builder  $query
   176|      * @return Builder
   177|      */
   178|     public function scopeIsShutdown($query)
   179|     {
   180|         return $query->where([
   181|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   182|             ['ignore', '=', 0],
   183|             ['disabled', '=', 0],
   184|             ['ifAdminStatus', '=', 'down'],
   185|         ]);
   186|     }
   187|     /**
   188|      * @param  Builder  $query
   189|      * @return Builder
   190|      */
   191|     public function scopeIsIgnored($query)
   192|     {
   193|         return $query->where([
   194|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   195|             ['ignore', '=', 1],
   196|         ]);
   197|     }
   198|     /**
   199|      * @param  Builder  $query
   200|      * @return Builder
   201|      */
   202|     public function scopeIsDisabled($query)
   203|     {
   204|         return $query->where([
   205|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   206|             ['disabled', '=', 1],
   207|         ]);
   208|     }
   209|     /**
   210|      * @param  Builder  $query
   211|      * @return Builder
   212|      */
   213|     public function scopeHasErrors($query)
   214|     {
   215|         return $query->where([
   216|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   217|             ['ignore', '=', 0],
   218|             ['disabled', '=', 0],
   219|         ])->where(function ($query) {
   220|             /** @var Builder $query */
   221|             $query->where('ifInErrors_delta', '>', 0)
   222|                 ->orWhere('ifOutErrors_delta', '>', 0);
   223|         });
   224|     }
   225|     /**
   226|      * @param  Builder  $query
   227|      * @return Builder
   228|      */
   229|     public function scopeIsValid($query)
   230|     {
   231|         return $query->where([
   232|             ['deleted', '=', 0],
   233|             ['disabled', '=', 0],
   234|         ]);
   235|     }
   236|     public function scopeHasAccess($query, User $user)
   237|     {
   238|         return $this->hasPortAccess($query, $user);
   239|     }
   240|     public function scopeInPortGroup($query, $portGroup)
   241|     {
   242|         return $query->whereIn($query->qualifyColumn('port_id'), function ($query) use ($portGroup) {
   243|             $query->select('port_id')
   244|                 ->from('port_group_port')
   245|                 ->where('port_group_id', $portGroup);
   246|         });
   247|     }

   249|     {

    48| check_dependencies() {
    49|     local branch ver_71 ver_72 ver_73 ver_81 python3 python_deps phpver pythonver old_branches msg
    50|     branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
    51|     scripts/check_requirements.py > /dev/null 2>&1 || pip3 install -r requirements.txt > /dev/null 2>&1
    52|     ver_71=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '7.1.3', '<');")
    53|     ver_72=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '7.2.5', '<');")
    54|     ver_73=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '7.3', '<');")
    55|     ver_81=$(php -r "echo (int)version_compare(PHP_VERSION, '8.1', '<');")
    56|     python3=$(python3 -c "import sys;print(int(sys.version_info < (3, 4)))" 2> /dev/null)
    57|     python_deps=$("${LIBRENMS_DIR}/scripts/check_requirements.py" > /dev/null 2>&1; echo $?)
    58|     phpver="master"
    59|     pythonver="master"
    60|     old_branches="^(php53|php56|php71-python2|php72|php73)$"
    61|     if [[ $branch =~ $old_branches ]] && [[ "$ver_81" == "0" && "$python3" == "0" && "$python_deps" == "0" ]]; then
    62|         status_run "Supported PHP and Python version, switched back to master branch." 'git checkout master'
    63|     elif [[ "$ver_71" != "0" ]]; then
    64|         phpver="php56"
    65|         if [[ "$branch" != "php56" ]]; then
    66|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php56 branch." 'git checkout php56'
    67|         fi
    68|     elif [[ "$ver_72" != "0" || "$python3" != "0" || "$python_deps" != "0" ]]; then
    69|         msg=""
    70|         if [[ "$ver_72" != "0" ]]; then
    71|             msg="Unsupported PHP version, $msg"
    72|             phpver="php71"
    73|         fi
    74|         if [[ "$python3" != "0" ]]; then
    75|             msg="python3 is not available, $msg"
    76|             pythonver="python3-missing"
    77|         elif [[ "$python_deps" != "0" ]]; then
    78|             msg="Python 3 dependencies missing, $msg"
    79|             pythonver="python3-deps"
    80|         fi
    81|         if [[ "$branch" != "php71-python2" ]]; then
    82|             status_run "${msg}switched to php71-python2 branch." 'git checkout php71-python2'
    83|         fi
    84|     elif [[ "$ver_73" != "0" ]]; then
    85|         phpver="php72"
    86|         if [[ "$branch" != "php72" ]]; then
    87|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php72 branch." 'git checkout php72'
    88|         fi
    89|     elif [[ "$ver_81" != "0" ]]; then
    90|         phpver="php73"
    91|         if [[ "$branch" != "php73" ]]; then
    92|             status_run "Unsupported PHP version, switched to php73 branch." 'git checkout php73'
    93|         fi
    94|     fi
    95|     set_notifiable_result phpver ${phpver}
    96|     set_notifiable_result pythonver ${pythonver}
    97|     if [[ "$phpver" == "master" && "$pythonver" == "master" ]]; then
    98|         return 0
    99|     fi
   100|     return 1
   101| }
   102| version_compare () {
   103|     local i ver1 ver2 parts1 parts2
   104|     if [[ "$1" == "$2" ]]; then
   105|         return 0
   106|     fi
   107|     IFS=. read -ra ver1 <<< "$1"
   108|     IFS=. read -ra ver2 <<< "$2"
   109|     parts2=${#ver2[@]}
   110|     [[ -n $3 ]] && parts2=$3
   111|     for ((i=${#ver1[@]}; i<parts2; i++)); do
   112|         ver1[i]=0

    24|     protected function migrateCharsetTo($charset, $collation)
    25|     {
    26|         if (\LibreNMS\DB\Eloquent::getDriver() != 'mysql') {
    27|             return;
    28|         }
    29|         $databaseName = DB::connection()->getDatabaseName();
    30|         DB::unprepared("ALTER SCHEMA `{$databaseName}` DEFAULT CHARACTER SET {$charset} DEFAULT COLLATE {$collation};");
    31|         $tableNames = DB::table('information_schema.tables')
    32|             ->where('table_schema', $databaseName)
    33|             ->pluck('TABLE_NAME');
    34|         foreach ($tableNames as $tableName) {
    35|             DB::unprepared("ALTER TABLE `{$tableName}` CHARACTER SET {$charset} COLLATE {$collation};");
    36|         }
    37|         $columns = DB::table('information_schema.columns')
    38|             ->where('table_schema', $databaseName)
    39|             ->whereNotNull('CHARACTER_SET_NAME')
    40|             ->whereNotNull('COLLATION_NAME')
    41|             ->where(function ($query) use ($charset, $collation) {
    42|                 $query->where('CHARACTER_SET_NAME', '!=', $charset)
    43|                       ->orWhere('COLLATION_NAME', '!=', $collation);
    44|             })
    45|             ->get();
    46|         foreach ($columns as $column) {
    47|             $null = $column->IS_NULLABLE == 'YES' ? 'NULL' : 'NOT NULL';
    48|             $default = null;
    49|             if (is_null($column->COLUMN_DEFAULT) || $column->COLUMN_DEFAULT == 'NULL') {
    50|             } else {
    51|                 $default = "DEFAULT '" . trim($column->COLUMN_DEFAULT, '\'') . "'";
    52|             }

     1| """
     2| This is a Bootstrap script for wrapper.py, in order to retain compatibility with earlier LibreNMS setups
     3| """
     4| import os
     5| import sys
     6| import logging
     7| from argparse import ArgumentParser
     8| import LibreNMS
     9| import LibreNMS.wrapper as wrapper
    10| WRAPPER_TYPE = "discovery"
    11| DEFAULT_WORKERS = 1
    12| """
    13|     Take the amount of threads we want to run in parallel from the commandline
    14|     if None are given or the argument was garbage, fall back to default
    15| """
    16| usage = (
    17|     "usage: %(prog)s [options] <amount_of_workers> (Default: {}"
    18|     "(Do not set too high, or you will get an OOM)".format(DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    19| )
    20| description = "Spawn multiple discovery.php processes in parallel."
    21| parser = ArgumentParser(usage=usage, description=description)
    22| parser.add_argument(dest="amount_of_workers", default=DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    23| parser.add_argument(
    24|     "-d",
    25|     "--debug",
    26|     dest="debug",
    27|     action="store_true",
    28|     default=False,
    29|     help="Enable debug output. WARNING: Leaving this enabled will consume a lot of disk space.",
    30| )
    31| parser.add_argument(
    32|     "-m",
    33|     "--modules",
    34|     dest="modules",
    35|     default="",
    36|     help="Enable passing of a module string, modules are separated by comma",
    37| )
    38| args = parser.parse_args()
    39| config = LibreNMS.get_config_data(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
    40| if not config:
    41|     logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    42|     logger.critical("Could not run {} wrapper. Missing config".format(WRAPPER_TYPE))
    43|     sys.exit(1)
    44| log_dir = config["log_dir"]
    45| log_file = os.path.join(log_dir, WRAPPER_TYPE + "_wrapper.log")
    46| logger = LibreNMS.logger_get_logger(log_file, debug=args.debug)
    47| try:
    48|     amount_of_workers = int(args.amount_of_workers)
    49| except (IndexError, ValueError):
    50|     amount_of_workers = DEFAULT_WORKERS
    51|     logger.warning(
    52|         "Bogus number of workers given. Using default number ({}) of workers.".format(
    53|             amount_of_workers
    54|         )
    55|     )
    56| wrapper.wrapper(
    57|     WRAPPER_TYPE,
    58|     amount_of_workers=amount_of_workers,
    59|     config=config,
    60|     log_dir=log_dir,
    61|     modules=args.modules or "",
    62|     _debug=args.debug,
    63| )

   680|  * @return int
   681|  */
   682| function set_numeric($value, $default = 0)
   683| {
   684|     if (! is_numeric($value) ||
   685|         is_nan($value) ||
   686|         is_infinite($value)
   687|     ) {
   688|         $value = $default;
   689|     }
   690|     return $value;
   691| }
   692| function get_vm_parent_id($device)
   693| {
   694|     if (empty($device['hostname'])) {
   695|         return false;
   696|     }
   697|     return dbFetchCell('SELECT `device_id` FROM `vminfo` WHERE `vmwVmDisplayName` = ? OR `vmwVmDisplayName` = ?', [$device['hostname'], $device['hostname'] . '.' . Config::get('mydomain')]);
   698| }
   699| /**
   700|  * Index an array by a column
   701|  *
   702|  * @param  array  $array
   703|  * @param  string|int  $column
   704|  * @return array
   705|  */
   706| function array_by_column($array, $column)
   707| {
   708|     return array_combine(array_column($array, $column), $array);
   709| }

  1035| function update_device_port_notes(Illuminate\Http\Request $request): JsonResponse
  1036| {
  1037|     $portid = $request->route('portid');
  1038|     $hostname = $request->route('hostname');
  1039|     $device_id = ctype_digit($hostname) ? $hostname : getidbyname($hostname);
  1040|     $data = json_decode($request->getContent(), true);
  1041|     $field = 'notes';
  1042|     $content = $data[$field];
  1043|     if (empty($data)) {
  1044|         return api_error(400, 'Port field to patch has not been supplied.');
  1045|     }
  1046|     if (set_dev_attrib($device_id, 'port_id_notes:' . $portid, $content)) {
  1047|         return api_success_noresult(200, 'Port ' . $field . ' field has been updated');
  1048|     } else {
  1049|         return api_error(500, 'Port ' . $field . ' field failed to be updated');
  1050|     }
  1051| }
  1052| function list_alert_rules(Illuminate\Http\Request $request)

    46| function escape_quotes($text)
    47| {
    48|     return str_replace('"', "\'", str_replace("'", "\'", $text));
    49| }//end escape_quotes()
    50| function generate_overlib_content($graph_array, $text)
    51| {
    52|     $overlib_content = '<div class=overlib><span class=overlib-text>' . $text . '</span><br />';
    53|     foreach (['day', 'week', 'month', 'year'] as $period) {
    54|         $graph_array['from'] = Config::get("time.$period");
    55|         $overlib_content .= escape_quotes(\LibreNMS\Util\Url::graphTag($graph_array));
    56|     }
    57|     $overlib_content .= '</div>';
    58|     return $overlib_content;
    59| }//end generate_overlib_content()

   642| function dynamic_override_config($type, $name, $device)
   643| {
   644|     $attrib_val = get_dev_attrib($device, $name);
   645|     if ($attrib_val == 'true') {
   646|         $checked = 'checked';

   648|         $checked = '';

# FILE: poller-wrapper.py
# Total hunks: 2
# ====================================================================
# --- HUNK 1: Lines 1-63 ---
     1| """
     2| This is a Bootstrap script for wrapper.py, in order to retain compatibility with earlier LibreNMS setups
     3| """
     4| import os
     5| import sys
     6| import logging
     7| from argparse import ArgumentParser
     8| import LibreNMS
     9| import LibreNMS.wrapper as wrapper
    10| WRAPPER_TYPE = "poller"
    11| DEFAULT_WORKERS = 16
    12| """
    13|     Take the amount of threads we want to run in parallel from the commandline
    14|     if None are given or the argument was garbage, fall back to default
    15| """
    16| usage = (
    17|     "usage: %(prog)s [options] <amount_of_workers> (Default: {}"
    18|     "(Do not set too high, or you will get an OOM)".format(DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    19| )
    20| description = "Spawn multiple poller.php processes in parallel."
    21| parser = ArgumentParser(usage=usage, description=description)
    22| parser.add_argument(dest="amount_of_workers", default=DEFAULT_WORKERS)
    23| parser.add_argument(
    24|     "-d",
    25|     "--debug",
    26|     dest="debug",
    27|     action="store_true",
    28|     default=False,
    29|     help="Enable debug output. WARNING: Leaving this enabled will consume a lot of disk space.",
    30| )
    31| parser.add_argument(
    32|     "-m",
    33|     "--modules",
    34|     dest="modules",
    35|     default="",
    36|     help="Enable passing of a module string, modules are separated by comma",
    37| )
    38| args = parser.parse_args()
    39| config = LibreNMS.get_config_data(os.path.dirname(os.path.realpath(__file__)))
    40| if not config:
    41|     logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    42|     logger.critical("Could not run {} wrapper. Missing config".format(WRAPPER_TYPE))
    43|     sys.exit(1)
    44| log_dir = config["log_dir"]
    45| log_file = os.path.join(log_dir, WRAPPER_TYPE + "_wrapper.log")
    46| logger = LibreNMS.logger_get_logger(log_file, debug=args.debug)
    47| try:
    48|     amount_of_workers = int(args.amount_of_workers)
    49| except (IndexError, ValueError):
    50|     amount_of_workers = DEFAULT_WORKERS
    51|     logger.warning(
    52|         "Bogus number of workers given. Using default number ({}) of workers.".format(
    53|             amount_of_workers
    54|         )
    55|     )
    56| wrapper.wrapper(
    57|     WRAPPER_TYPE,
    58|     amount_of_workers=amount_of_workers,
    59|     config=config,
    60|     log_dir=log_dir,
    61|     modules=args.modules or "",
    62|     _debug=args.debug,
    63| )

   237|     function edgeEdit(edgedata) {

   240|         } else {

   249|           },

   268|         $("#edgebpsshow").bootstrapSwitch('state', (edgedata.edge1.label != null && edgedata.edge1.label.includes('bps')));

   276|     function edgePortSearchUpdate(node1_id, node2_id, edge_id) {

   286|         if(edge_id in edge_port_map) {

   297|             $("#edgePortReverseRow").hide();

   301|         port_search_device_id_2 = (node2.id in node_device_map) ? node_device_map[node2.id].device_id : 0;
   302|     }

    91|     function edgeNodesRemove(nm_id, edgeid) {
    92|         if (nm_id in edge_nodes_map) {
    93|             const edge_idx = edge_nodes_map[nm_id].indexOf(edgeid);
    94|             if (edge_idx >= 0) {
    95|                 edge_nodes_map[nm_id].splice(edge_idx, 1);
    96|             }
    97|         }
    98|     }
    99|     function edgeNodesUpdate(edgeid, node1_id, node2_id, old_node1_id, old_node2_id) {
   100|         var nm_id = node1_id < node2_id ? node1_id + '.' + node2_id : node2_id + '.' + node1_id;
   101|         var old_nm_id = old_node1_id < old_node2_id ? old_node1_id + '.' + old_node2_id : old_node2_id + '.' + old_node1_id;
   102|         if (nm_id == old_nm_id) {
   103|             return;
   104|         }
   105|         if (old_node1_id > 0 && old_node2_id > 0) {
   106|             edgeNodesRemove(old_nm_id, edgeid);
   107|         }
   108|         if (!(nm_id in edge_nodes_map)) {
   109|             edge_nodes_map[nm_id] = [];
   110|         }

   347|     function toggleLegend() {
   348|         var width = $("#mapwidth").val();
   349|         var mapwdith = 100;
   350|         if (!isNaN(width)) {
   351|             mapwidth = width;
   352|         } else if (width.includes("px")) {
   353|             mapwidth = width.replace("px", "");
   354|         } else if (width.includes("%")) {
   355|             mapwidth = window.innerWidth * width.replace("%", "") / 100;
   356|         }
   357|         if (legend.x < 0) {
   358|             legend.x = mapwidth - 50;
   359|             legend.y = 100;
   360|         } else {
   361|             legend.x = -1;
   362|             legend.y = -1;
   363|         }
   364|         redrawLegend();
   365|     }
   366|     function redrawLegend() {
   367|         old_nodes = network_nodes.get({filter: function(node) { return node.id.startsWith("legend_") }});
   368|         old_nodes.forEach((node) => {
   369|             network_nodes.remove(node.id);
   370|         });
   371|         if (legend.x >= 0) {
   372|             let y_pos = legend.y;
   373|             let y_inc = legend.font_size + 10;
   374|             let legend_header = {id: "legend_header", label: "<b>Legend</b>", shape: "box", borderWidth: 0, x: legend.x, y: y_pos, font: {multi: 'html', size: legend.font_size}, color: {background: "white"}};
   375|             network_nodes.add(legend_header);
   376|             y_pos += y_inc;
   377|             if (!(Boolean(legend.hide_invalid))) {
   378|                 let this_colour = 'black';
   379|                 if(legend.colours) {
   380|                     this_colour = legend.colours['-1'];
   381|                 }
   382|                 let legend_invalid = {id: "legend_invalid", label: "???", title: "Link is down or link speed is not defined", shape: "box", borderWidth: 0, x: legend.x, y: y_pos, font: {face: 'courier new', size: legend.font_size, color: "white"}, color: {background: this_colour}};
   383|                 y_pos += y_inc;
   384|                 network_nodes.add(legend_invalid);
   385|             }
   386|             if(legend.colours) {

# --- HUNK 4: Lines 394-476 ---
   394|                         i++;
   395|                     }
   396|                 });

   409|                     y_pos += y_inc;
   410|                 }
   411|             }
   412|             network_nodes.flush();
   413|         }
   414|     }

   434|     function saveMapData() {
   435|         $("#map-saveDataButton").attr('disabled', 'disabled');
   436|         var nodes = {};
   437|         var edges = {};
   438|         $.each(network_nodes.get(), function (node_idx, node) {
   439|             if(node.id.startsWith("legend_")) {
   440|                 return;
   441|             } else if(node.id.endsWith("_mid")) {
   442|                 edgeid = node.id.split("_")[0];
   443|                 edge1 = network_edges.get(edgeid + "_from");
   444|                 edge2 = network_edges.get(edgeid + "_to");
   445|                 edges[edgeid] = {id: edgeid, text_colour: edge1.font.color, text_size: edge1.font.size, text_face: edge1.font.face, from: edge1.from, to: edge2.from, showpct: (edge1.label != null && edge1.label.includes("xx%")), showbps: (edge1.label != null && edge1.label.includes("bps")), label: (node.label || ''), fixed_width: (edge1.width || null), port_id: edge1.title, style: edge1.smooth.type, mid_x: node.x, mid_y: node.y, reverse: (edgeid in edge_port_map ? edge_port_map[edgeid].reverse : false)};
   446|             } else {
   447|                 if(node.icon.code) {
   448|                     node.icon = node.icon.code.charCodeAt(0).toString(16);
   449|                 } else {
   450|                     node.icon = null;
   451|                 }
   452|                 if("unselected" in node.image) {
   453|                     if(node.image.unselected.indexOf(custom_image_base) == 0) {
   454|                         node.image.unselected = node.image.unselected.replace(custom_image_base, "");
   455|                     } else {
   456|                         node.image = {};
   457|                     }
   458|                 }
   459|                 nodes[node.id] = node;
   460|             }
   461|         });
   462|         $.ajax({
   463|             url: '{{ route('maps.custom.data.save', ['map' => $map_id]) }}',
   464|             data: JSON.stringify({
   465|                 newnodeconf: newnodeconf,
   466|                 newedgeconf: newedgeconf,
   467|                 nodes: nodes,
   468|                 edges: edges,
   469|                 legend_x: legend.x,
   470|                 legend_y: legend.y,
   471|                 legend_steps: legend.steps,
   472|                 legend_font_size: legend.font_size,
   473|                 legend_hide_invalid: legend.hide_invalid,
   474|                 legend_hide_overspeed: legend.hide_overspeed,
   475|                 legend_colours: legend.colours,
   476|             }),

   560|     function refreshMap() {
   561|         edge_nodes_map = [];
   562|         $.get( '{{ route('maps.custom.data', ['map' => $map_id]) }}')
   563|             .done(function( data ) {
   564|                 $.each( data.nodes, function( nodeid, node) {
   565|                     var node_cfg = {};
   566|                     node_cfg.id = nodeid;
   567|                     if(node.device_id) {
   568|                         node_device_map[nodeid] = {device_id: node.device_id, device_name: node.device_name, device_image: node.device_image};
   569|                         node_cfg.title = node.device_id;
   570|                     } else if(node.linked_map_id) {
   571|                         node_cfg.title = "map:" + node.linked_map_id;
   572|                     } else {
   573|                         node_cfg.title = null;
   574|                     }
   575|                     node_cfg.label = node.label;
   576|                     node_cfg.shape = node.style;
   577|                     node_cfg.borderWidth = node.border_width;
   578|                     node_cfg.x = node.x_pos;
   579|                     node_cfg.y = node.y_pos;
   580|                     node_cfg.font = {face: node.text_face, size: node.text_size, color: node.text_colour};
   581|                     node_cfg.size = node.size;
   582|                     node_cfg.color = {background: node.colour_bg, border: node.colour_bdr};
   583|                     if(node.style == "icon") {
   584|                         node_cfg.icon = {face: 'FontAwesome', code: String.fromCharCode(parseInt(node.icon, 16)), size: node.size, color: node.colour_bdr};
   585|                     } else {
   586|                         node_cfg.icon = {};
   587|                     }
   588|                     if(node.style == "image" || node.style == "circularImage") {
   589|                         if(node.image) {
   590|                             node_cfg.image = {unselected: custom_image_base + node.image};
   591|                         } else if (node.device_image) {
   592|                             node_cfg.image = {unselected: node.device_image};
   593|                         } else {
   594|                             node_cfg.shape = newnodeconf.shape;
   595|                             node_cfg.icon = newnodeconf.icon;
   596|                             node_cfg.image = newnodeconf.image;
   597|                         }
   598|                     } else {
   599|                         node_cfg.image = {};
   600|                     }
   601|                     if (network_nodes.get(nodeid)) {
   602|                         network_nodes.update(node_cfg);
   603|                     } else {
   604|                         network_nodes.add([node_cfg]);
   605|                     }
   606|                 });
   607|                 $.each( data.edges, function( edgeid, edge) {
   608|                     edgeNodesUpdate(edgeid, edge.custom_map_node1_id, edge.custom_map_node2_id, -1, -1);
   609|                     var mid_x = edge.mid_x;
   610|                     var mid_y = edge.mid_y;
   611|                     var mid = {id: edgeid + "_mid", shape: "dot", size: 0, x: mid_x, y: mid_y, label: edge.label};
   612|                     mid.size = 3;
   613|                     var arrows;
   614|                     if (Boolean(reverse_arrows)) {
   615|                         arrows = {from: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, to: {enabled: false}};
   616|                     } else {
   617|                         arrows = {to: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, from: {enabled: false}};
   618|                     }
   619|                     var edge1 = {id: edgeid + "_from", from: edge.custom_map_node1_id, to: edgeid + "_mid", arrows: arrows, font: {face: edge.text_face, size: edge.text_size, color: edge.text_colour}, smooth: {type: edge.style}};

     3|     var custommap = {
     4|         legendPctDefaultColour: function (pct) {
     5|             if (pct < 0) {
     6|                 return "black";
     7|             } else if (pct < 50) {
     8|                 return '#' + parseInt(5.1 * pct).toString(16).padStart(2, 0) + 'ff00';
     9|             } else if (pct < 100) {
    10|                 return '#ff' + parseInt(5.1 * (100.0 - pct)).toString(16).padStart(2, 0) + '00';
    11|             } else if (pct < 150) {
    12|                 return '#ff00' + parseInt(5.1 * (pct - 100.0)).toString(16).padStart(2, 0);
    13|             }
    14|             return '#ff00ff';
    15|         },

    66|         createNetwork: function (elementId, scale, nodes, edges, options, bgtype, bgdata) {
    67|             nodes.flush();
    68|             edges.flush();
    69|             var container = document.getElementById(elementId);
    70|             var network = new vis.Network(container, {nodes: nodes, edges: edges, stabilize: true}, options);
    71|             network_height = $($(container).children(".vis-network")[0]).height();
    72|             network_width = $($(container).children(".vis-network")[0]).width();
    73|             var centreY = Math.round(network_height / (2 * scale));
    74|             var centreX = Math.round(network_width / (2 * scale));
    75|             network.moveTo({position: {x: centreX, y: centreY}, scale: scale});
    76|             setCustomMapBackground(elementId, bgtype, bgdata);
    77|             network.on('zoom', function (data) {
    78|                 if(data.scale < scale) {
    79|                     network.moveTo({position: {x: centreX, y: centreY}, scale: scale});
    80|                 }
    81|             });
    82|             return network;
    83|         },
    84|         getNodeCfg: function (nodeid, node, screenshot, custom_image_base) {
    85|             var node_cfg = {};
    86|             node_cfg.id = nodeid;
    87|             if(node.device_id) {
    88|                 node_cfg.title = node.device_info;
    89|             } else if(node.linked_map_name) {
    90|                 node_cfg.title = "Go to " + node.linked_map_name;
    91|             } else {
    92|                 node_cfg.title = null;
    93|             }
    94|             node_cfg.label = screenshot ? node.label.replace(/./g, ' ') : node.label;
    95|             node_cfg.shape = node.style;
    96|             node_cfg.borderWidth = node.border_width;
    97|             node_cfg.x = node.x_pos;
    98|             node_cfg.y = node.y_pos;
    99|             node_cfg.font = {face: node.text_face, size: node.text_size, color: node.text_colour};
   100|             node_cfg.size = node.size;
   101|             node_cfg.color = {background: node.colour_bg_view, border: node.colour_bdr_view};
   102|             if(node.style == "icon") {
   103|                 node_cfg.icon = {face: 'FontAwesome', code: String.fromCharCode(parseInt(node.icon, 16)), size: node.size, color: node.colour_bdr};
   104|             } else {
   105|                 node_cfg.icon = {};
   106|             }
   107|             if(node.style == "image" || node.style == "circularImage") {
   108|                 if(node.image) {
   109|                     node_cfg.image = {unselected: custom_image_base + node.image};
   110|                 } else if (node.device_image) {
   111|                     node_cfg.image = {unselected: node.device_image};
   112|                 } else {
   113|                     node_cfg.shape = newnodeconf.shape;
   114|                     node_cfg.icon = newnodeconf.icon;
   115|                     node_cfg.image = newnodeconf.image;
   116|                 }
   117|             } else {
   118|                 node_cfg.image = {};
   119|             }
   120|             if(! ["ellipse", "circle", "database", "box", "text"].includes(node.style)) {
   121|                 node_cfg.font.background = "#FFFFFF";
   122|             }
   123|             return node_cfg;
   124|         },
   125|         getEdgeCfg: function (edgeid, edge, fromto, reverse_arrows) {
   126|             if (Boolean(reverse_arrows)) {
   127|                 arrows = {from: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, to: {enabled: false}};
   128|             } else {
   129|                 arrows = {to: {enabled: true, scaleFactor: 0.6}, from: {enabled: false}};
   130|             }
   131|             var edge_cfg = {id: edgeid + "_" + fromto, to: edgeid + "_mid", arrows: arrows, font: {face: edge.text_face, size: edge.text_size, color: edge.text_colour, background: "#FFFFFF"}, smooth: {type: edge.style}};
   132|             if (fromto == "from") {
   133|                 edge_cfg.from = edge.custom_map_node1_id;
   134|                 var port_pct = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_topct : edge.port_frompct;
   135|                 var port_bps = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_tobps : edge.port_frombps;
   136|                 var port_colour = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.colour_to : edge.colour_from;
   137|                 var port_width = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.width_to : edge.width_from;
   138|             } else if (fromto == "to") {
   139|                 edge_cfg.from = edge.custom_map_node2_id;
   140|                 var port_pct = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_frompct : edge.port_topct;
   141|                 var port_bps = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.port_frombps : edge.port_tobps;
   142|                 var port_colour = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.colour_from : edge.colour_to;
   143|                 var port_width = Boolean(reverse_arrows) ? edge.width_from : edge.width_to;
   144|                 if(edge_cfg.smooth.type == "curvedCW") {
   145|                     edge_cfg.smooth.type = "curvedCCW";
   146|                 } else if (edge_cfg.smooth.type == "curvedCCW") {
   147|                     edge_cfg.smooth.type = "curvedCW";
   148|                 }
   149|             } else {
   150|                 console.log("custommapGetEdgeCfg got an invalid value in fromto:" + fromto);
   151|                 return {};
   152|             }
   153|             if(edge.port_id) {
   154|                 edge_cfg.title = edge.port_info;
   155|                 if(edge.showpct) {
   156|                     edge_cfg.label = port_pct + "%";
   157|                 }
   158|                 if(edge.showbps) {
   159|                     if(edge_cfg.label == null) {
   160|                         edge_cfg.label = '';
   161|                     } else {
   162|                         edge_cfg.label += "\n";
   163|                     }
   164|                     edge_cfg.label += port_bps;
   165|                 }
   166|                 edge_cfg.color = {color: port_colour};
   167|                 edge_cfg.width = parseFloat(edge.fixed_width) || port_width;
   168|             }
   169|             return edge_cfg;
   170|         },
   171|         getEdgeMidCfg: function (edgeid, edge, screenshot) {

   173|             var mid_y =  edge.mid_y;

    39| <script type="text/javascript">
    40|     var height = $(window).height() - 100;
    41|     $('#visualization').height(height + 'px');
    42|     var network_nodes = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    43|     var network_edges = new vis.DataSet({queue: {delay: 100}});
    44|     var network;
    45|     var Countdown;
    46|     function updateHighlight(hlcb) {
    47|         if (hlcb.id == 'showchilddevicepath') {
    48|             $("#showparentdevicepath").prop( "checked", false );
    49|         } else if (hlcb.id == 'showparentdevicepath') {
    50|             $("#showchilddevicepath").prop( "checked", false );
    51|         }
    52|         refreshMap();
    53|     }
    54|     function refreshMap() {
    55|         var highlight = $("#highlight_node").val();
    56|         var showpath = 0;
    57|         if ($("#showparentdevicepath")[0].checked) {
    58|             showpath = 1;
    59|         } else if ($("#showchilddevicepath")[0].checked) {
    60|             showpath = -1;
    61|         }
    62| @if($group_id)
    63|         var group = {{ $group_id }};
    64| @else
    65|         var group = null;
    66| @endif
    67|         $.post( '{{ route('maps.getdevices') }}', {disabled: 0, disabled_alerts: null, link_type: "depends", url_type: "links", group: group, highlight_node: highlight, showpath: showpath})
    68|             .done(function( data ) {
    69|                 let device_count = Object.keys(data).length;
    70|                 if (device_count === 0) {
    71|                     $("#alert").text("No devices found");
    72|                     $("#alert-row").show();
    73|                 } else if (device_count > 500) {
    74|                     $("#alert").text("The initial render will be slow due to the number of devices.  Auto refresh has been paused.");
    75|                     $("#alert-row").show();
    76|                 } else {
    77|                     $("#alert").text("");
    78|                     $("#alert-row").hide();
    79|                 }
    80|                 function deviceSort(a,b) {
    81|                     return (data[a]["sname"] > data[b]["sname"]) ? 1 : -1;
    82|                 }
    83|                 var keys = Object.keys(data).sort(deviceSort);
    84|                 $.each( keys, function( dev_idx, device_id ) {
    85|                     var device = data[device_id];
    86|                     var this_dev = {id: device_id, label: device["sname"], title: device["url"], shape: "box", level: device["level"]}
    87|                     if (device["style"]) {
    88|                         this_dev = Object.assign(device["style"], this_dev);
    89|                     }
    90|                     if (network_nodes.get(device_id)) {
    91|                         network_nodes.update(this_dev);
    92|                     } else {
    93|                         network_nodes.add([this_dev]);
    94|                         var highlight_option = document.createElement("option");
    95|                         highlight_option.value = device_id;
    96|                         highlight_option.id = "highlight-device-" + device_id;
    97|                         highlight_option.textContent = device["sname"];
    98|                         document.getElementById("highlight_node").appendChild(highlight_option);
    99|                     }
   100|                     $.each( device["parents"], function( parent_idx, parent_id ) {
   101|                         link_id = device_id + "." + parent_id;
   102|                         if (!network_edges.get(link_id)) {
   103|                             network_edges.add([{from: device_id, to: parent_id, width: 2}]);
   104|                         }
   105|                     })
   106|                 })
   107|                 if (! network) {
   108|                     network_nodes.flush();
   109|                     network_edges.flush();
   110|                     var container = document.getElementById('visualization');
   111|                     var options = {!! $options !!};
   112|                     network = new vis.Network(container, {nodes: network_nodes, edges: network_edges, stabilize: true}, options);
   113|                     network.on('click', function (properties) {
   114|                         if (properties.nodes > 0) {
   115|                             let cur_highlighted = $('#highlight_node').val();
   116|                             if (cur_highlighted == properties.nodes) {
   117|                                 $('#highlight_node').val(0).trigger('change');
   118|                             } else {
   119|                                 $('#highlight_node').val(properties.nodes).trigger('change');
   120|                             }
   121|                         }
   122|                     });
   123|                     network.on('doubleClick', function (properties) {
   124|                         if (properties.nodes > 0) {
   125|                             window.location.href = "device/device="+properties.nodes+"/"
   126|                         }
   127|                     });
   128|                 } else {
   129|                     $.each( network_nodes.getIds(), function( dev_idx, device_id ) {
   130|                         if (!(device_id in data)) {
   131|                             network_nodes.remove(device_id);
   132|                             var option_id = "#highlight-device-" + device_id;
   133|                             $(option_id).remove();
   134|                         }
   135|                     });
   136|                 }
   137|                 $("#alert").text("");
   138|                 $("#alert-row").hide();
   139|             });
   140|     }

     1| @extends('layouts.librenmsv1')

     7| @if($group_name)
     8| &nbsp;<big><b>{{ $group_name }}</b></big>
     9| @endif

    11|     Highlight Node
    12|     <select name="highlight_node" id="highlight_node" class="input-sm" onChange="refreshMap()";>

    14|         <option value="-1">Isolated Devices</option>
